item.title: Lyne Moser
item.description: About Me Since March 2017, I am a PhD student at EPFL, under the supervision of Jérôme Scherer and Kathryn Hess. During the Spring semester 2020, I received a Doc.Mobility grant from the Swiss National Foundation and participated in the MSRI program Higher categories and categorification in Berkeley. I graduated on February 26, 2021. From April 2021, I will be a postdoc at the MPIM in Bonn. Research Interest I am interested in category theory and homotopy theory.
